text:
I have defined in server.xml a home attribute for ContextManager such as:

<ContextManager debug="0" home="/mycustom/tomcat" workDir="work" >

When starting tomcat, the ajp12.id file is saved in /mycustom/tomcat/ajp12.id.

however, when stopping tomcat, the server is looking for the ajp12.id file from 
tomcat.home (/usr/local/jakarta-tomcat/conf) which is not where the file was 
saved to when starting.

my current workaround is to create a symlink from /usr/local/jakarta-
tomcat/conf/ajp12.id to /mycustom/tomcat/conf/ajp12.id.
creator: apachebugs@jline.com

Added a -ajpid option you can pass to stop tomcat.
